content: a printable ad-free version of the pattern can be purchased here 1 + description carefree and lightweight the florence backpack taps right into all the excitement of an impending trip… with every stitch how can you not imagine all the spur-of-the-moment places this carryall bag will travel crocheted holding two strands of yarn together for extra shape and stability this roomy bag is the ideal size to fit all your daily essentials perfect for daily use or a trip to the local farmers market the simple and classic shape makes this bag super versatile and an all year round accessory… making this little number a great place to store your wip while on the go whether you re enjoying a picnic in a field or out for the weekend the backpack s drawstring closure will keep your valuables secure whilst the sturdy shoulder straps will ensure it s super comfortable to carry… giving this easy-going bag its effortlessly relaxed feel + materials 7mm 2 crochet hook 1270yds bulk yarn 12ply - lion brand rewind yarn tapestry needle stitch markers + finished size backpack height 12 5 32cm backpack width 15 5 39cm strap length 31 79cm + skills this is an intermediate level crochet pattern includes how-to photos you must be familiar with basic crochet stitches and techniques directions written so that they are easy to read and follow all patterns are in english and written in standard us terms + shipping instant download + about me hello friends i m olivia the busy bee behind hopeful honey where i love to design and share unique crochet patterns my style is chic but playful which is distinctively reflected in my work resulting in timeless pieces with hints of quirky touches inspired by the beauty of natural landscapes all around us i constantly aim for comfort warmth and versatility whilst closely paying attention to detail i always want to capture those special moments and feelings that life exudes and channel them into every piece i make + copyright the pattern and photographs of this garment are the property of hopeful honey this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-comercial use only you may not republish redistribute or sell this pattern without consent for more information please visit http //www hopefulhoney com/policies thank you for being respectful of the time and creativity gone into making this design copyright © www hopefulhoney com 2018 1 http //www hopefulhoney com/2018/09/florence-backpack-crochet-pattern html
